knimeNode.name: HTTPS Connection (legacy)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Configures the connection information used to connect to a remote host.

fullDescription.intro:
This legacy file handling node has been replaced by the HTTP(S) Connector and will become deprecated in the foreseeable future. For further information about the new file handling framework see the File Handling Guide.
This node configures the connection information that will be used to connect to a remote host.
